casebody.data:
James O. CARTER, Administrator of the Estate of George W. Baughman, Plaintiff
v.
Ruby BAUGHMAN f/k/a Ruby Bryan Noble, a/k/a Ruby Bryan Sledge, a/k/a Ruby Bryan, a/k/a Kim Jones, a/k/a Janet Mercer, a/k/a Ruby Bryan Ives, a/k/a Justina Jones, Defendant No. COA18-51 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 21, 2018

APPEAL DISMISSED.
